metadata.title: HEAT HOLDERS Men's No1 Thermal Socks Long Charcoal gray 7-12 Us
features: Thick, chunky and with a massive tog rating of 2.34 for warmth
Heat Holders are made from a specially developed heavy bulk yarn which has extreme thermal qualities
Brushed inside to hold heat within without sweating - Long Knee length
Ideal inside boots and for anyone who works outside -gentle grip tops
An ideal Gift- Women's and children's versions in my Amazon shop
description: Thick, chunky and with a massive tog rating of 2.34, Heat Holders are made from a specially developed heavy bulk yarn which has extreme thermal qualities. With long pile cushioning, these thermal socks will help keep feet fully comfortable and supported. The inside of each sock has been intensively brushed that not only feels sensationally soft but also traps warm air close to the skin keeping your feet warmer for longer. Long Knee Length. 7-12 us
